public boolean isProductInUseByOffer(ProductEto product)
        Description copied from interface: Offermanagement
        Checks, whether a given ProductEto is in use by at least one OfferEto.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        product - product to check if it is in use
        Returns:

      • saveOffer

        @RolesAllowed(value="SaveOffer")
public OfferEto saveOffer(OfferEto offer)
        Description copied from interface: Offermanagement
        If no ID is contained creates the OfferEto for the first time. Else it updates the OfferEto with given ID. If no OfferEto with given ID is present, an exception will be thrown.
        Specified by:
        saveOffer in interface Offermanagement
        Parameters:
        offer - the OfferEto to persist.
        Returns:
        the generated/updated offer
